actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a prototype of a counterfeit-resistant Social Security card, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) develop a prototype of a counterfeit-resistant social security card; and (2) conduct a study and issue a report to the Congress examining different methods of reducing fraud in the social security card application process. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a prototype of a counterfeit-resistant Social Security card, and for other purposes.
